bug.author: BartekKrzepkowski
bug.summary: PyCM result unavailable to save to csv format
bug.description: I suppose pycm doesn't support 'overall_param' anymore within save_csv method. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19740116/68950196-f17cfb00-07bb-11ea-98f5-c183a8d38bf6.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi, thanks for your issue! That's unfortunate, best solution would be to replace this method with one that takes *args and **kwargs. I'll aim to fix within a couple of days.
